attributes.action: Sack Sir Bernard Hogan-Howe for not apologising to Lord Brammall.
attributes.background: I understand the need for the Police to investigate a crime but in the case of the evidence provided by 'Nick' , it all appears to be untrue and the reputations of Lord Brittan, Sir Edward Heath and now Lord Brammall are trashed.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments.
